headline: AFRM Extends Partnership With Williams-Sonoma to Bring BNPL to Canada
summary: Affirm expands BNPL services to Canada through Williams-Sonoma, boosting its reach across premium brands like West Elm and Pottery Barn.

raw.headline: AFRM Extends Partnership With Williams-Sonoma to Bring BNPL to Canada
raw.summary: Affirm expands BNPL services to Canada through Williams-Sonoma, boosting its reach across premium brands like West Elm and Pottery Barn.

headline: Williams-Sonoma Expands Payment Partnership With Affirm in Canada
summary: WSM expands payment options in Canada by extending partnership with Affirm to offer flexible financing across its family of brands.

raw.headline: Williams-Sonoma Expands Payment Partnership With Affirm in Canada
raw.summary: WSM expands payment options in Canada by extending partnership with Affirm to offer flexible financing across its family of brands.

headline: Affirm expands partnership with Williams-Sonoma into Canada
summary: Affirm (AFRM) announced the expansion of its partnership with Williams-Sonoma (WSM) into Canada, building on their existing U.S. collaboration. This brings Affirm’s pay-over-time options to Canadians shopping at Williams-Sonoma’s brands, including Williams Sonoma, West Elm, Pottery Barn, Pottery Barn Teen, Pottery Barn Kids, and Mark & Graham. Approved Canadian shoppers can now split purchases into monthly payments with no late or hidden fees. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for
